title: Issue Notice to Proceed
description: After signing a contract with a new subcontractor, the contract manager must issue a formal Notice to Proceed (NTP).

tasks.description: Generate a Notice to Proceed document using the standard template for the specified subcontractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new NTP document is created.

tasks.description: Set the official start date in the NTP and send it to the subcontractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The NTP is sent to the subcontractor with the correct start date.
